Plot: When the crew of an American tugboat boards an abandoned Russian research vessel, the alien life form aboard regards them as a virus which must be destroyed.
Title: Virus
Writer: Chuck Pfarrer (creator: Dark Horse Comic Book series: "Virus"), Chuck Pfarrer (screenplay), Dennis Feldman (screenplay)
Actors: Jamie Lee Curtis, William Baldwin, Donald Sutherland, Joanna Pacula
tomatoConsensus: Despite its great special effects, this movie's predictability greatly undermines its intensity.
